name: Count It Up!
description:
Counting numbers has never been this fun; and that makes Count It Up! the Most Entertaining Game of 2015 by SBAA and has been featured 2 times.

★ How to play: simply swipe or tap along the tiles with numbers in consecutive ascending order and don't tap the wrong tiles.

4 Game Modes:
★ Arcade: many fun Levels from easy to hard; you simply count from 1 to 50 or 100.
★ Endless: see how far you can go and compare with other players.
★ Time Attack: challenge yourself with the clock ticking, super fast paced.
★ Inferno: get ready for the World's hardest game.

Special Features:
★ Original Gameplay with 50 Levels.
★ Simple and Fun Graphics.
★ Designed for Families and Kid Friendly.
★ Google Leaderboards and Achievements.
★ Options to login with Facebook, share your score and invite friends.
★ Languages: English, Español, Français, Deutsch, Português, Русский язык, 日本語, 한국어, Tiếng Việt and 中文.

This game is designed to challenge your observation, number identification and reaction skills. It's a tile based puzzle, fun brain training, highly addictive, and perfect to play with friends and family.

Also on iTunes App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/count-it-up/id1073787050

CREDITS:
Music by Brian Coburn.
